title: Skybridge Americas to Demonstrate SkyAssist(TM) Technology at the 2015 SOCAP Annual Conference in Hollywood, Florida October 19 and 20, 2015
text:
Skybridge Americas, Inc. 
MINNEAPOLIS, Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Skybridge Americas, an award winning local market provider of contact center and fulfillment services to customers who demand proven value, today announced the launch of its SkyAssist(TM) Technology. SkyAssist(TM), enables customer service representatives to deliver a perfect pitch every time and 100% script adherence while serving multiple customers at the same time. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277348LOGO 
Skybridge Americas will be demonstrating its SkyAssist(TM) Technology in Booth 114 at the 2015 SOCAP Annual Conference in Hollywood, Florida October 19 and 20, 2015. 
" Imagine a customer service agent taking several calls at once while maintaining the perfect pitch every time. "SkyAssist(TM) powers our customer service representatives to take the guesswork out of script adherence," said Jeannine Peterson, President of Skybridge Americas Contact Center Business. "Come witness for yourself. It's not too good to be true - It's SkyAssist(TM)." 
SkyAssist ensures valuable information is delivered correctly every time so there are no mis-quoted rates, figures, statistics, offers or incentives. It also eliminates variables such as pronunciations, inflections and pitch. It is an innovative solution for companies that require 100% script compliance or demand the highest level of quality ensuring all disclosures are made in their entirety on every call. 
" With the launch of our SkyAssist(TM) Technology, and through our Skybridge Americas customer service representatives, we address three primary challenges every contact center executive faces ", remarked Peterson. " How does my brand continue to increase the overall quality of the customer experience? How can I increase agent compliance and adherence in order to mitigate risk? How can I ensure that my outsource partner continues to drive ROI to our business? All of these are accomplished by leveraging our SkyAssist(TM) Technology and our Skybridge Americas customer service representatives". 
About Skybridge Americas 
For over 25 years, Skybridge Americas has been an award-winning, local market provider of tailored contact center and fulfillment solutions delivering the highest quality and best results for customers who demand proven value. Skybridge Americas supports over 350 leading brands across a wide variety of industries through its North American network of contact and product fulfillment centers and work-at-home agents. Join us on LinkedIn , follow us on Facebook or Twitter (@SkybridgeAmer ) or visit us at www.skybridgeamericas.com .
